website_summaries.verdict: A fun, flashy scooter that works best for younger kids.
pros: If your kid wants to ride at dusk, this light-up scooter is your best option
The lights along the stem, wheels, and deck increase visibility and show up even in daylight
cons: With the low price comes somewhat flimsy construction
Some customers reported that the LEDs stopped working quickly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic affordable toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons 5th Birthday. This was a huge hit. My 8 year old loves that it lights up. Remember to place 3 double A batteries in the bottom as the tires will automatically light up. The lights are bright and many different functions. My 8 year old is 5 foot and she can ride it easily. I would say a 3 year up to maybe 12 years old for this
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Lights do
customer_reviews.text: The lights don’t stay on because the batteries don’t fit tight enough so every time you hit a bumb the lights go out. If you stuff a paper towel in with the batteries the lights will stay on longer. It would be great if the lights would stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Morrow

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: What my son liked about it is it rides kind of smooth and he likes the lights on the bottom and the top. What he didn't like is that the lights on the bottom broke quickly. The wheel lights work well. The wheel and the handle bar kept getting twisted and he didn't like that. ( Please note, the more expensive scooter, the better quality.)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: LED Lights inoperative out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The LED lights in the base of the scooter and the steering column don't work immediately out of the box. Like other reviewers say, putting a paper towel in the battery holder seemed to snug them up momentarily enough to make solid contact but the first bump my son hits, the lights quit working again. I filled out a form on their website directly and they're asking for serial numbers, videos of the problem, etc. and it's silly. Obviously this is a known issue if you read the reviews here. What a shame. My son was so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Haley

customer_reviews.title: Cool scooter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old and he loves it! The lights work great!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! My husband and I have also ridden on it and have had fun. The lights add another fun element to it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Owens

customer_reviews.title: 7yr busy boy-
customer_reviews.text: Hello- overall product is great, waited a few weeks to write a review to observe product survive my 7yr old busy boy whos hard on everything- overall not bad- for price- it seems to have held up over last couple weeks- I put 4/5 on sturdiness because with just use- some areas seem loose- we've had other scooters and this one for the price was right and i'd probably buy again for my younger son. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Arnold

customer_reviews.title: NOT MADE OF GOOD MATERIALS!
customer_reviews.text: Not made with great material...bar keeps twisting causing my Grandson to fall...
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/previously owned
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this scooter for my son’s birthday. When I opened the box to assemble it, the scooter was clearly used. The entire body of the scooter was scuffed up and when I turned it over, the battery cover was missing and a label with another child’s name was still affixed to it. It was very disappointing and the replacement will not arrive in time for my son’s birthday.
customer_reviews.author: KGC

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. For $29.99 this would be ok. Cheap but ok. THIS THING IS AWESOME. my kid loves it. It’s so sturdy... the lights are super bright and the lights in the wheels are so cool. I will be buying this as gift for my kids friends. It’s great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alid

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 year old son. I had to return and replace it once because it was missing parts. It didn't light up very well, never could get the handle to light, just occasionally the wheels. After 2 months while he was riding the screw that keeps the front wheel in just came out. The front wheel came out and he fell. I was able to find the wheel but not the screw. Contacted the manufacturer multiple times to get a replacement screw with no responses. Really disappointing. Won't buy from Jetson again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Penningon

customer_reviews.title: Breaks melted from heat of lights
customer_reviews.text: Materials on this scooter are very cheap. The lights got the break pad (on 2 different scooters!) so hot that the break pads melted through! One even further melted my daughter's sandal that was stepping on the break. The construction of this scooter is cheap and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: NRR

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old really wanted one with lights. He was so excited to find this one and I loved the price. We took it outside and the lights on the front stopped working within 5 minutes. We would keep resetting it and it would work for a minute until he started moving and then every time they went out. My husband was able to rig it though. He put cardboard inside the coil spring in the battery case so that the batteries wouldn't move away from the positive contact. That seemed to work and we have had no issues since.
customer_reviews.author: MomWithAnAmazonProblem

customer_reviews.title: Low price but cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price & deigns of lighting, but lacks overall quality. The LED light quit working after few days, and rear brake lever broke off now.
customer_reviews.author: shayden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Buy from a box store for an easy return just in case.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these from Target for our 4yr old grandson and it's been fantastic. So we decided to order 3 from here for our other grandchildren and they've been completely disappointing. The lights on one stopped working after one day (with brand new batteries), the brake broke off of another, and a wheel on the third became misshapen after 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it but need better and stronger cover underneath !
customer_reviews.text: Kids love playing with these scooters since the first day, they love the way those lights flashing on the street, really cool and nice. But also come with a serious problem, the battery compartment cover can’t provide strong protection due to impact, like kids riding it through bump or any other uneven road. One of my scooter lost all batteries and cover as well! This cover should be more deeper into the scooter or more stronger to prevent happen again!
customer_reviews.author: Yanni SoShy

customer_reviews.title: Faulty alignment
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the lights and the board is just the right size for a younger child, but despite repeated toggling and tightening, the alignment of the wheel and handles continues to slip. It’s just not worth the hassle. Should have gone with a traditional razor.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeymama2017

customer_reviews.title: love it but brake broke!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived a 6 days ago. My son LOVED riding it and loved getting use to scooting for the first time. But all of a sudden the brake snapped off!!! The brake is made out of plastic and just snapped off. We are SO SAD!! OTHER than that, we were LOVING our Jetson scooter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Its so so
customer_reviews.text: It is a great scooter but does have one downfall. I did read in a previous review that there were issues with the battery box and it not holding the batteries tightly within the box. Causing the LED lights to not stay on. This is true I had the same experience with the one I purchased. When I received it the screw hole for the battery plate was already stripped as well. If it had a better quality box for the batteries it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: chole

customer_reviews.title: 20 seconds of fame
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, it look nice while working. The first day 20 minutes after unpacking the back wheel stoped lighting and when you turn the lights on it only last about 20 seconds and goes out. Not fun to ride when you have to stop and flip the scooter over every 20 minutes to turn the lights on. I as well as my neighbor brought the scooter at the same time and she had the same exact issue within the same time frame of unboxing.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: POS DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express enough just what a pice of s***t this is. This is so bad. Hands down the worst scooter we've had. it's hard to adjust and does not stay tight in the right places. We have had to adjust it constantly and unfortunately thought at first it was just a matter of adjusting correctly or we would have returned it right away. The wheel get's stuck, the handle constantly misaligns. Horrible all around.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Maybe they upgraded this, I don’t see any of the issues people mentioned in past reviews... batteries stay snug in compartment, and you screw in the cover.... handle bar is screwed in and secure...good quality materials used ... has a nice feel to it...kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I first got this from Target: after a couple uses the handle bars would turn opposite of the wheels. I took everything apart, and made sure everything was tight ( still had the problem) So I bought a second one off of Amazon. Exact same problem out of the box except now the LED lights drag to the side. Just buy a razor scooter, and avoid this disaster.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Received defective, brake went bad 3 weeks in
customer_reviews.text: Really nice scooter for the price, but unfortunately, The brake mechanism Suddenly stopped working. I believe I received a defective unit, Otherwise it was a really nice scooter while it lasted. The lights are bright and fun, The lights on the base need batteries in order to function but the rest of the lights are on all of the time.. We got a lot of use out of it for the 3 weeks before the brake went bad, I will be trying a different model, luckily my son had knee and elbow protection on when he took the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara CT

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son since he loved riding his cousin's scooter. Assembly was ok for the most part but there is a screw that you're supposed to screw in for the handle. No matter what I do, I can't get it in, and I spent a LONG time trying. It got so frustrating that I just gave up. Folding and unfolding is not very user friendly, especially for my 5 yr old, so we just leave it open all of the time. It's really sturdy and my son loves the lights. We've had it only for a couple months so we'll have to see if this can last. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: minzmahname

customer_reviews.title: Good scooter but lights are flawed
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was exactly what our 9 year old wanted. He hated riding bikes. The scooter came fast and was incredibly easy to assemble. Only downside was that the lights in the wheels seem to be the only ones that work properly. We waited until. Dark so he could see it all lit up. The lights only worked for about 3 seconds and then they turned off. We attempted several times to get them to light back up (theres a button on the bottom) overall it's a nice scooter. He still really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: jason weber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew. He said it was the best gift and exactly what he wished for!! Aww!! I am so glad he loves it. He asks his parents to take him out to ride it. He gets so many people telling him how cool it is and it is nice for his parents to see him while ridding it. It has tons of different settings, so they love customizing that. It is easy to fold up, so it can be easily stored away when not using
customer_reviews.author: Amber H

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride, nice grips, lights. Small, Lights invisible, tough to fold
customer_reviews.text: I'll put forth concise points. Pros: 1. Rides extremely smooth. 2. Lights are an added attraction. 3. Handle grips are very nice. Cons: 1. Small. 2. Lights are not visible at all in any sun light. Only visible when light outside is really low. 3. Not easily foldable. Takes a lot of effort to fold. 4. Side body base hits the road easily on turns and gets chaffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: brake lever broke, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: i was happy with the purchase and my 4 year old loved riding the scooter. few weeks in, the brake lever broke, which was disappointing. contacted the customer care to check for the best option to fix it and they confirmed that they will send a new scooter. the experience was great and is still waiting for the confirmation about shipment of the replacement. otherwise, great product and is also sturdy. my kid was really stoked with the lights..
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: So cool! Even I, the parent, loves watching it glow on our night time walks! It does not look like it goes very high so I’m not sure how long he will be able to use it! I’m sure a couple of years but I expected it to be like the razor scooters that practically grow with you! He loves it though and for the price, very much worth it! Make sure you follow the directions to put it together, it looked so simple I did not at first.. almost ruined the whole thing by getting a screw stuck 🥴. Dumb on my end!
customer_reviews.author: KMRANDALL926

customer_reviews.title: cool toy, but wheels don't turn freely and half the lights quit after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: So bummed, kids got a hold of them and were thrilled (6 and 8 year olds)... until second day when half the LEDs wouldn't light up (the stem lights). We tried everything - new batteries, turning off and on again, even looking for loose wires. Additionally, the wheels didn't turn freely. Good for the 6yo, frustrating for the 8yo. Tried exchanging but could only do refund. So now we are returning and buying Razors. Probably should have started there, even though they don't light up. Disappointing, but fun for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Flplantdrs

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the lights.
customer_reviews.text: My son (7) was excited to see all the flashing lights. The handle bars extend up and it seems sturdy enough frame wise. Unfortunately when you turn the bolt that connects when to scooter loosens... We tightened (for now) and unfortunately ended up breaking the cord for the under lights (the next day after unpackaging). Also I wish there was some kind of button on the scooter itself the button is on the very bottom of the scooter so you have to turn it over to activate. The wheels light up great though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but... Undercarriage lighting needs a tweak
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo graduated from his 3wheeled scooter so he picked this one out. The undercarriage lighting will turn off if you hit a bump so do as folks suggest by wedging some paper to make the batteries fit more snugly, preventing them from jostling out of place. Once we did that, it was nonstop fun riding along the sidewalk at night.
customer_reviews.author: cmrs25

customer_reviews.title: Stick with durable razors, this broke in multiple ways within a week
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week of moderate usage by a 6 year old. Brake broke off, front wheel would not stay straight, lights were not working consistently. Super hard to open and close. No thank you, we will stick with our razors. I am returning this and cannot recommend it
customer_reviews.author: C. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. It arrived on time for christmas. She loved the lights!
customer_reviews.author: Dora Negron

customer_reviews.title: Everything breaks apart!
customer_reviews.text: This product looked great when it arrived except the lights on the front handle did not work. We were ok with it, happy to use with only the wheels glowing. But when the product is not even a month old, break broke and then the bottom panel that conceals the wires is broken. Totally not worth the money. Has messaged the company to claim warranty. will update, if we get response/money back.
customer_reviews.author: Poorna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but Lights Don't work on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The bike looked sturdy after the assembly. Sturdy and we liked it, but the lights didn't work and there is no way to troubleshoot as it is all assembled inside. Also, I can' t locate the manufacturer or the supplier to Amazon to even discuss. May be it is a trick that most the Amazon sellers are using nowadays to stay away from the consumers and make them keep the products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sivakumar

customer_reviews.title: Good scooter for price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this scooter. She really liked that it lit up however you cant see it during the day at all and I'm not letting her at 7 years old ride it at night. Button is harder to find on the bottom to get it to light up and they only stay on maybe 30 seconds. I did have to adjust the handle bars all the way up and the way kids grow at this age I don't see getting more than a year or two out of it without it getting too short for her. I wish it would have been a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra leuck

customer_reviews.title: Breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: So awesome on the day you get it but it breaks almost immediately. First the lights stop working on the foot pad and then within two weeks stops staying centered and the foot pad and handle bars start to misalign. This happened with THREE different scooters. THREE. If you don’t mind the lights stop working and you have to get off and realign the handle bars with the foot pad every 2 minutes then buy it. Otherwise get a different scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Kiri

customer_reviews.title: Cheap scooter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scooter for my 7 year old.He wanted this for the lights.Assembly was quick and easy.I also liked that it is foldable so very easy to carry. But the quality is not so good and also like many reviewers complained lights stopped working if it hits any bump.I bought it only for the lights and lights are not working.I should have bought some thing else of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Yamin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your $. Bought this for our daughter for her birthday and the button to turn the lights on sunk into the scooter, so you couldn't push it to activate the lights. Frantically we bought another one, in hopes that was a fluke, to give her for her birthday. The second scooter, the lights won't stay on while she rides it. Should have learned our lesson the 1st time. Bought 2 and neither worked. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: It’s good if you don’t want to use the lights
customer_reviews.text: I do like how sturdy it is and it does have a solid feel to it. My only issue is that my 6 yr old daughter really can’t have the lights on for long. She usually rides it for a minute or so until she rides over a sidewalk crack causing the lights to turn off. Pretty frustrating for her and for me to have to keep turning on the lights.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parra

customer_reviews.title: Issue with front wheel, batteries/lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scooter for my 9-year-old son. The first two days of use have been interrupted with issues with the battery compartment. The screw on the battery compartment doesn't fit properly, causing the batteries to fall out on the ground while riding. We've duct taped the battery compartment cover closed, used a liquid threader to try to keep the screw in, then used a longer screw. Now that the screw is staying in, the lights still shut off. So with the compartment closed, there is still an issue with the battery connectivity. Also, the front wheel shifts and turns on its own, which is a safety issue. It's a cool-looking scooter that would be fun to use otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic brake wore out in 1 weekend
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize brake was plastic which I purchased and within 1 weekend of son riding it, the plastic wore right through and chunked off. Terrible design! In looking at other scooters, most have a metal brake for this reason. Rather than having option through Amazon to contact seller, it gives a link to manufacturer's website which is completely unhelpful. Very disappointed in this product! Would not recommend that anyone buy it as is with the plastic brake.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ann Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great little scooter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6yo son and he absolutely loves that it lights up. It’s well made, has great handle grips and works as it should. I only wish the lights would not shut off automatically. They should only turn off when you physically choose to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good starter Scooter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these scooters for Christmas gifts. They filled the wishes of a couple of kids that really wanted a "light up scooter". These scooters LIGHT UP! Not only do the wheels light up when moving, the staff lights up, and so does the base; just don't forget the AA batteries. These are, however, not as sturdy as a Razor brand scooter. I think with the plastic on the base has me a little skeptical of the sturdiness of it. I would still recommend this scooter though.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Kluever

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Rear brake broken after only about a dozen reasonable (non-abusive) uses. The handle column nuts near the bottom rattle loose too easily and frequently. The foot board is plastic and not very sturdy. The LED lights work and are neat, but they are not enough to make up for the poor craftsmanship and cheap materials from which this disappointing scooter was made. I DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a second pair of these for my twins so they can have a set at grammie’s house when we visit. They love them. Nice and bright and the lights make cool patterns. My only criticism is the on off switch is under the board, so it’s a pain to switch the lights up or turn them off. But other than that a winner
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fantantic item
customer_reviews.text: After recieving the wronge item at first , i ordered another when it arrived and i must say within 6 days intenationally from USA to UK ,my grandsons face was a picture thank you great scooter well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C.

customer_reviews.title: Broke and warranty is a sham
customer_reviews.text: It was fun, while it lasted. My son was ecstatic with the lights, no problems with blinking off. The brake, however, broke after 28 days. I’m kicking myself for not returning to Amazon. I went through their customer support, who was very responsive, told us a new one was on the way... we submitted the claim July 5, it’s now September 29 and after 3 communications and apologies for covid delays and promises of getting its expedited, still nothing, just a frustrated kid (and mom)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wheel stopped lighting up within a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: No problem to set up - and for the first minute or two - it worked great! Then the back wheel stopped lighting up! Willing to replace it with the same product however, and keep my fingers crossed that it won't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: L. John

customer_reviews.title: Glowing review but
customer_reviews.text: The little thing to make it stand is missing compared to other models.
customer_reviews.author: OLE

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Literally this is garbage quality. I assembled it and because it's so hard to open and close my son doesn't even play with it. I would buy another just becuase of how cool it light up but it's just sad that within a month it can't open and close properly.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha J

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This product looked so awesome I loved it at least wanted to... broke the same day I gave it to my son. the bottom completely broke off which holds holds the led light strands... so once it broke off it was broke broke because it is plastic not metal. Will post pictures once my son gets back home.
customer_reviews.author: Cherice

customer_reviews.title: Scooter is heavy and handles can be screwed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this scooter because the handle can't be screw, I tried many times to screw the handle but everytime falls and it can't be screw. Lights are really poor. On the box shows big bright lights, on reality lights are small and don't shine. The scooter is also too heavy. My children complain Not being able to ride because is heavy. I am being trying to return the scooters, I bought 2. It is a bad investment. Until now I am Not being able to return these scooter. Nobody answer the phone number.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scooter
customer_reviews.text: My grandson turned 5 and he loved this scooter. He was scooting all over on it with flashing lights and having a great time. Its sturdy and everything worked great. The price is great for this little scooter. I would say a perfect first ride for the youngsters 4 and 5 years old. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Plott

customer_reviews.title: Looks flasher than it really is
customer_reviews.text: The wheels light up when the scooter goes fast. The battery pack is underneath the part where you put your feet. After turning in the lights (button is also underneath), if you hit a bump they turn right off. You have to get off to turn on. My son doesn’t mess with lighting up the scooter that much anymore because he was tired of getting off every time. The handle bar is a bit shaky at full extension.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Zink

customer_reviews.title: Cool scooter, great price
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very easy to fold and some of the lights on the first one we got stopped working after one day. But we got another one because between the nice design, smooth ride, cool light up wheels and great price, it was still worth it. It’s sturdy but it does scratch up pretty quickly. Even with its flaws though, it still seems better than any other scooter I’ve seen for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing screw
customer_reviews.text: Missing screw to screw in handle bars Update. Put a zip tie in it becAuse was missing screw so my kid could ride and he was able to ride maybe 5 times before the entire thing broke. I have this exact one from target with a screw I got as well and it’s also broken don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for an energetic child
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for our son and he loves it. The package comes with complimentary stickers which our son placed all over his new scooter. The best part though, were the lights. It was a great buy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Yanique Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved this at first! But I wouldn’t say its very sturdy. I have tried everything but the front wheel attached to the handle bars keeps coming lose so that the handle bar is straight and the front wheel is completely sideways. Making it so the kids can’t safely use it. Today while ride it my son tried to turn. The handle bar turned but the wheel kept going straight causing my son to fall and scrapping up his whole side. I think for the money it should have been better
customer_reviews.author: LEO/Veteran/Father

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kid's Scooter
customer_reviews.text: These scooters with led lights really attracted my boys and they can't stop riding. The quality is great but the screw that secures the top handle bar doesn't go in for both scooters that I purchased. Other than that these are excellent rides.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is definately not worth the money. The plastic that is supposed to be the brake was gone in a day and then my daughter proceeded to use her shoe as her brake and put a massive hole in the sole of the shoe. I would not reccomend this scooter at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Gleadow

customer_reviews.title: Overall Ok...
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered it first time and when it came, it was not opening up looked like it was malfunctioned. I had to get an exchange and it opened up fine and the lights worked well for week or 2 then some of them died. I changed the battery and nothing changed.
customer_reviews.author: Jimil

customer_reviews.title: Lights are faulty, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Junk, lights turn off with the slightest impact (like a joint in the sidewalk) we got two from different places, one on amazon. Both have the same issue. (Not a battery issue as they turn right back on when you push the button)
customer_reviews.author: Bloomingintoagallop

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I totally forgot to comment on this product! It's foldable,, but takes a little time. Pretty smooth. Definitely worth the price! The light is my son's favorite! Overall the quality is way way better than my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: joyce jj

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: Fun product for 4, 6, 9, and 11 year olds! Doesn't come with batteries. Takes AA. 2, or 3. Came with a sheet of stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please pass on this scooter
customer_reviews.text: This has a very bad design flaw. The battery compartment isn’t in the right spot in my opinion and the batteries t loose and arise the lights to shut off. The bolts for the handle to keep the wheel in line keeps getting loose as well. Nice and cute idea but pass on this scooter
customer_reviews.author: elisha

customer_reviews.title: Was good but gets loose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old and he loved it despite it getting loose al the time even after tightening everything. The front wheel goes crooked all the time while he’s riding it causing him to fall. He still rides it but it’s an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: April B

customer_reviews.title: The lantern design is not good enough
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I want to buy it is because of its colorful light design, but the bottom and the side of the lights are battery, and sometimes a minute of darkness, sometimes half an hour of brightness just dark, a little baffling feeling! But it's still good to skate on, suitable for older children
customer_reviews.author: yanqing

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter. Wish the LED buttons were a bit more accessible, but I guess it keeps the lights from turning on by accident. I was worried about the brake mechanism but he was quick to pick that up. As always, put a helmet on your little ones!
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Rides well, but lights wire is weak and easy to break
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and cool lights, but broke on day one. The wire in the handle ripped from my son turning and the pole coming out. Bummer on the lights but the bottom lights still work and the scooter still rides so it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were simple to read, however, the pole that attaches to handlebar was installed backwards. Needed help to figure out why it wouldn't pull out and had to take it apart to reinstall it properly. Sturdy and fun for my 8 year old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: lililani

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED lights, but the battery box lid came with a defect
customer_reviews.text: Overall the scooter is good, the LED lights are shiny. The problem is the battery box lid, which has a defect when it came. See the attached photos.
customer_reviews.author: slarkee

customer_reviews.title: NOT a quality product
customer_reviews.text: from small to big things this is not a product built to high quality standards. Small failure - the blinking lights randomly stop working & need to be turned on again. Big & dangerous failure - the union at the neck (joining to the deck) does not stay tight and leads to a wobbly scooter, which in turn led to a falling child! Returned first scooter with the light failure, and second scooter will be returned also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun scooter but the lights won’t last!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the scooter lights up it was the right size for my kids who are 9, 7 and 4. The ride is really smooth. Definitely agree with the other reviewer. that this product could have been made with better materials especially the base. The handle keeps twisting around which is why the LEDs in the handle broke and I have to fix it (see picture). The wire coming out of the base to the handle was cut or either snapped because of the 380 twist of the handle. It’s a nice scooter but it’s only been three days so.... Let’s see how many more times I have to fix these LEDs 😒
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: No puddles
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this scooter, only downside is the battery box at the bottom, anytime he goes over a bump the batteries fall out. Also since the batteries are down there, no riding through puddles!
customer_reviews.author: Keehan Fam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The foot brake for this scooter is plastic. For those that don't know, you push down on the brake which rubs the back wheel to slow/stop the scooter. Took my kid less than a week to wear through the plastic and start burning her shoe. Unbelievable how this design made it through QA.
customer_reviews.author: BobK

customer_reviews.title: Complete piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Used this inside only & it broke in a week. Horrible design. Difficult to fold. I wouldn't recommend this scooter to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Allen

customer_reviews.title: Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons 4th birthday and it’s a hit. We use it on the lowest setting for the handle bars The lights are really fun. I will say they have a lot of the same pattern on the bar part but the bottoms pattern changes up. Been very sturdy but not too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Pleasant pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars built cheap not safe to ride & not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I give the Jetson Jupiter light up scooter 2 stars. Because I had just recently purchased it 5 days ago, & found out that when riding it for the first time, I noticed that it felt very flimsy, wobbly, very unsafe to ride on. The front wheel kept getting stuck & would keep going in opposite directions, which made it unstable. And I also was dissatisfied with the lights not wanting to work after putting a fresh pair of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Nice but doesn’t work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, very sturdy and well built. However right out of the box everything. After literally 2 min after outing the batteries in, the lights on the handle part stopped working. The support line on amazon says it is open on the weekends, but when I called they are only open monday thru Thursday. Hopefully they will replace it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Schornack

customer_reviews.title: The Lights go out...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his birthday and After my son only having it for a week the lights stopped working! We reached out to the actual company they said they would send him out a new one and they would let me know when it was shipped and that was weeks ago and we still haven’t gotten it or heard anything back. But it was great while it worked I guess. And I’m hoping his replacement comes soon.....
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Check lights when you receive it
customer_reviews.text: When we put the batteries in for the handle and bottom to light up the handle part never shuts off so it kills the batteries! A bit disappointed because that’s the whole reason we got a scooter with lights was to use the lights but can’t really afford to just waste batteries constantly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights don't always work right
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year liked it but all the lights don't work together very well. The switch on the bottom is not very convenient and it keeps turning off when she is using it. When is DOES work, it's quite fun.
customer_reviews.author: NightReader

customer_reviews.title: Was so excited but it kind of sucks
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this product. Fell apart the first use the screw was stripped upon arrival and the handlebars were never secured my daughter cried a ton. Still trying to get the piece from customer service will update if it comes.. But really really bummed
customer_reviews.author: A. Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product, highly disappointed as it was birthday gift for my little one
customer_reviews.text: The scooter which comes with lots of bells and whistles is not at all a sturdy and quality product. lights stopped working barely after a few days and the handlebar continues to turn randomly despite fixing it several times. this has caused a very unpleasant experience for my little one for whom it was a birthday gift. unfortunately, since I lost the opportunity of returning within 30 days, it is now lying idle and of no use. I would not recommend buying this product and request amazon/manufacturer to provide me option to return this faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Alok Soni

customer_reviews.title: Summer is fire with a scooter like this but must
customer_reviews.text: Omg everywhere we go in NYC people asking where I get it even the Chinese store owners came fast I recommend it loved the lighting doesn't drain batteries another thing your kids will enjoy the spot light.. .in times like these we need positive spot light thank u for brightening my son world
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: The kids love these
customer_reviews.text: We own two of them and both kids love them. The lights make it so much more fun for them as well. The lights on the shaft and the foot plate time out after a few minutes, but the kids don't seem to mind pressing the button to turn them back on.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Stuck, but cute!
customer_reviews.text: What a cute scooter! It adjusted to fit our 6 year old grand daughter very well. She had a blast with the lights. The only problem we encountered was that the handle kept getting stuck in a sideways position. We don’t know why...
customer_reviews.author: pam firestone

customer_reviews.title: Take Two Goung Great
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old son chose this as a prize for spelling test scores. He was so excited, but very disappointed when the scooter lights quit working within 1 day. Wheel lights were fine. Within a month of arrival, I contacted the Jetson team via Amazon website. They immediately sent me a new one. Second one works great so far! Scooter itself is very sturdy, and you cannot beat the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Leaon

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this scooter, but, unfortunately, the lights quit working on the neck of the scooter.... 🙄 I put new batteries in, if my daughter hits a bump, the under glow, under the deck of the scooter, shuts off..
customer_reviews.author: Brooke L Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: It's a neat concept
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice and fun at first. But the stem came off, causing the wires to disconnect, so it doesn't light up anymore. We put it back on so she could still ride it. The handle bars came off next, haven't been able to put them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun scooter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Jetson Jupiter Kick Scooter with LED Light-Up Deck, Stem, and Wheels for our grandson's 7th birthday. Not only did he enjoy playing with it, but his (much) older cousins did as well! We all love the lights!
customer_reviews.author: Quris

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: We didn't like the scooter as it's poorly constructed. The top comes loose and then finally while my daughter was on the street, it came apart. Will be getting her a new one.
customer_reviews.author: jgb

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: East to assemble, but the wheel gets stuck to the right or left when attempting to turn causing a serious hazard and or injury. Went to Jetson with videos and photos of the issue and they sent a replacement, although it took 6 weeks. Received the replacement and same issue with an hour of riding it. You get what you may for- get a RAZOR! If I would give it zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is cheap I’ve only had it since July 5 th and it broke in half by September 6th. My nephew Is only 5 years old and used it every 3 days whe he was riding it and it broke. I contacted the company and they have not gotten back to me and I’m supposed to be under the warranty. I have insurance through Amazon asurion and they are no help to me. I would not recommend anyone buy this piece of crap it might break while your child is riding it
customer_reviews.author: janine

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality and price. My son loves the lights. It is very smooth wheels are of good quality. I do wish the adjustability was a bit more and some of the fasteners were a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive
customer_reviews.text: not that great , cud have been more better with stability , din like it much bought for my 6 yo
customer_reviews.author: Ng’s View

customer_reviews.title: Go with a different kind
customer_reviews.text: The lights that go up the handle don’t work, the bolt that tightens the handle won’t get tight so the handles keep turning and have to turn it back try to tighten it again just for it to go back to where it was, wish the lights worked and the bolt could tightened to where my son could actually use it for more than 5 mins!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

product_meta.title: Jetson Jupiter Kick Scooter, Black - LED Light-Up, Adjustable Handle Bar, for Kids Ages 5+
product_meta.description: With over 100 LED lights on the handlebar stem, wheels, and deck, The jetson Jupiter folding kick scooter is sure to light the way for nonstop fun! An easy folding mechanism located near the bottom of the stem makes it simple to fold the handlebar towards the deck and lock it into place. This easy folding design, along with a lightweight frame, makes this kid scooter a breeze to carry and store. Plus, the handlebar is height adjustable, so kids can keep playing as they keep growing. And since safety is always top of mind, The Jupiter sports an easy to access rear fender foot brake, to ensure a secure, full stop every time.
feature_bullets: All systems go – the lightweight design and easy folding mechanism make it easy to pick up and carry.
Play favorites – over 100 LED lights integrated in the STEM and deck, along with LED light-up wheels, provide extra visibility, improve safety, and brighten the fun.
Built for fun - the sturdy wide deck and durable frame are built to last, so the Jupiter is ready for light-years of fun!
Always Growing - easily adjust the handlebar height to suit your child as they grow.
Safety first - the Jupiter sports an easy to access rear foot brake for a complete and full stop.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
